Title: Series: Life of St Anthony
Description: Plate numbered XI; St Anthony's vision of Christ; St Anthony standing to left gesturing towards heaven and healing a man kneeling on the ground to right supported by other men behind; with a demon felling into a landscape behind; from a series of 27 scenes of the life of St Anthony. 1597 Etching
Curator's comments: BM has a complete set, in bound form: see 163.c.01, in addition to this individual print, which is a late state in which the plate number has been altered from IX to XI.
Associated names: Portrait of: St Antony of Egypt
